memberdef.name: BOOST_ASSIGN_V2_FRAMEWORK_CHAIN
memberdef.initializer: template<typename R1,typename U2,typename Tag> \ typename chain_aux::result<U1, U2, Tag>::type \ operator|(U1 & r1, chain_aux::adaptor1<U2, Tag> const & h) \ { \ typedef chain_aux::result<U1, U2, Tag> caller_; \ return chain_aux::make_sub( caller_::call( r1, h.value ) ); \ } \ \
